published.name: NotifyRolesChangedAPI
published.description: This API operation is called by the Mendix platform when you change a user's app roles from the platform. It only notifies your app that a specific user's app roles have to be retrieved again from the Mendix platform, after which your app will call the AppRolesAPI.

contracts.value: {"swagger":"2.0","info":{"title":"NotifyRolesChangedAPI","description":"This API operation is called by the Mendix platform when you change a user's app roles from the platform. It only notifies your app that a specific user's app roles have to be retrieved again from the Mendix platform, after which your app will call the AppRolesAPI.","version":"1.0.0"},"host":"{host}","basePath":"/mendixsso-api/notifyroleschanged/v1","schemes":["{scheme}"],"paths":{"/user/{uuid}":{"get":{"tags":["user"],"parameters":[{"name":"uuid","in":"path","required":true,"type":"string"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"successful operation"}}}}},"tags":[{"name":"user","description":""}]}
